article_title: Brazil’s Petrobras Sues Construction Firm to Recoup Losses
article_text:
RIO DE JANEIRO—Brazilian state-run oil company Petróleo Brasil SA has started going to court against contractors and executives to seek repayment of cash allegedly stolen in a graft scheme.

Petrobras filed civil lawsuits alongside federal prosecutors Friday against construction firm Mendes Júnior, after filing a similar suit on April 30 against Engevix, the company said in an emailed statement. Petrobras is seeking a total 452...
